name: The Harbinger Group
tagline: We help companies tell their best story.
description:
The Harbinger Group delivers high-value business results through public relations and communications programs.
In an increasingly fractured media environment, industry experts seem to come and go with the day's news. Commanding the attention of any audience is difficult; sustaining that attention requires much more than public statements and press releases.
At The Harbinger Group, we can help you rise above the clamor.
